# üëã Hello! Welcome to my GitHub profile!

<p align="justify">
Hello! I'm @MarcoLoPinto! My passion lies at the intersection of advanced technology and real-world applications, with a strong focus on developing practical AI and machine learning solutions. I have been involved in research projects centered around natural language processing and semantic analysis, aiming to enhance the way machines understand human language. I thrive in dynamic environments and I'm always eager to tackle new challenges and broaden my technical expertise!

## üìÑ Published Papers
- **NounAtlas: Filling the Gap in Nominal Semantic Role Labeling**: "...We introduce a novel approach to create the first large-scale, high-quality inventory of nominal predicates and organize them into semantically-coherent frames. Although automatically created, NounAtlas ‚Äì our frame inventory ‚Äì is subsequently fully validated. We then put forward a technique to generate silver training data for nominal SRL and show that a state-of-the-art SRL model can achieve good performance. Interestingly, thanks to our design choices which enable seamless integration of our predicate inventory with its verbal counterpart, we can mix verbal and nominal data and perform robust SRL on both types of predicates." <br />
[![Read Paper](https://img.shields.io/badge/Read_Paper-blue?)](https://aclanthology.org/2024.acl-long.857/)
[![GitHub Repo](https://img.shields.io/badge/GitHub_Code-gray?logo=github)](https://github.com/SapienzaNLP/nounatlas)
[![ACL 2024 Badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/ACL_2024-Outstanding_Paper_Award-f3f3f3.svg?style=style=flat-square&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,)](https://2024.aclweb.org/)
- üöß Works in Progress... üöß
